Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "What's this guy doing here?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I heard you're having fun in combat. Of course I wanna be a part of it!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Boys and girls went on an adventurous journey in search of the lost history...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Never thought that Kamui is actually...', 3: '12', 4: 'Well... said?', 5: '12'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Adventure and vigor! A song of boys and girls! Isn't this a qualified role-playing game?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...He's just a game fanatic.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, is this... how our battle seems?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "The way I see it, the whole story about the Moe Army is suspicious. Doesn't sound like a proper hero story at all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But they fought hard and won, isn't that enough? It's pretty awesome!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Take me with you!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'The Corrupted and all that, easy peasy!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't blame us if you get disappointed after tagging along. Besides, given your poor power, I guess it won't be any different whether you join us or not.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But sure I'm better than Lee, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are you trying to get shot?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Yeah! Try me!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee, Kamui, fights are not allowed in the team.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Kamui, I'm here to confirm that are you sure to join the Gray Raven and carry out the mission with us?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Of course! Let me be a part of it!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, what do you say?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Let him in.', 3: '42', 4: "I've got no other choice.", 5: '42'}
